title: Well-written critique of Bush's approach to terrorism and Iraq
body: <a href="http://www.commondreams.org/views04/0414-10.htm">A Scary Performance, and a Signal for Slaughter</a> (from my mom).   It talks about <a href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog/archive/2004/04/14/193.aspx">Bush's Speech</a> the other night and what a <a title="miserable failure" href="http://www.whitehouse.gov/president/gwbbio.html" >miserable failure</a> he is.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-15

Well-written critique of Bush's approach to terrorism and Iraq
